EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_Spring Days New York Social_Q217.2017 Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for registering for the Spring Days New York Social
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for the Spring Days NY Social on June 20th at Carmine's Italian Restaurant in Times Square. We look forward to seeing you there after the first day of Spring Days NY .
Date: Tuesday, June 20, 2017
Time:
5:30PM to 7:30PM
Location: Carmine's Italian Restaurant | Times Square 200 W 44th St. New York, NY 10036 (map <[[https://www.google.com/maps?ll=40.757547,-73.986739&z=12&t=m&hl=en-US&gl=US&mapclient=embed&cid=1155783591561813087]]>)
Should you have any questions or would like more information about this event, please email Tasha Isenberg at tisenberg@pivotal.io <[[mailto:tisenberg@pivotal.io]]>.
The Pivotal Team Event Details <[[http://connect.pivotal.io/Spring-Days-New-York-Social.html]]>
